cm.fwi.dao.PoolException

  • Packages that use PoolException 
    Package Description
    cm.fwi.dao  

    • Uses of PoolException in cm.fwi.dao

      Methods in cm.fwi.dao that throw PoolException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Pool.closeConnections()
      This method clause all connections of the Pool's instace and clear both the states and connections lists.
      void DAOFactory.closePool()
      close the connections manage by the pooling connection (unique instance of Pool)
      void ProfileDaoImpl.createProfile(Profile profile) 
      void ProfileDaoImpl.deleteProfile(java.lang.Long id) 
      void Pool.deliverConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
      Deliver a connection of the pooling (unique instance of Pool) by setting its state from busy(false) to free(true).
      void DAOFactory.deliverConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
      This method deliver a connection to the pooling connection
      java.sql.Connection Pool.getConnection()
      This method return the first free (true state) connection of the pooling connection (unique instance of Pool) and set the state of this connection to busy(false in the state list).
      java.sql.Connection DAOFactory.getConnection()
      Get a connection from the current Pool instance.
      static Pool Pool.getInstance(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      This method create the unique instance of Pool if is not yet done.
      Profile ProfileDaoImpl.readProfile(java.lang.Long id)
